document.full_text: duke's quest to repeat as college basketball national champions will begin in the west region as the blue devils were named one of four top seeds on sunday for this year's ncaa tournament.
document.title: duke among top seeds as ncaa field unveiled
lines_and_colors: duke's quest to repeat as college basketball national champions will begin in the west region as the blue devils were named one of four top seeds on sunday for this year's ncaa tournament.
